name: OrcAttack.io
description:
Orcs are encroaching on your kingdom, and you're the last line of defense before they take your king. 

Gather resources to build your defenses, upgrade your weapons, and hire mercenaries to fend off the green tide for as long as possible!

CONTROLS:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look and aim direction

Left Mouse Click - Attack (if using magic, hold click)

E - Interact: Gather resources (stand next to a resource and press E), drop resources off (stand on top of the stockpile (marked by a crate) and press E), open weapon shop (stand next to the armor bust and press E), build walls (stand next to grey outlines and press E), hire mercenaries (stand next to banners and press E), upgrade backpack (stand next to the backpack icon and press E to increase carry capacity).
